entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
